 Whereas, in Samurai,(士) the top stroke is longer, because he's angry and has both arms extended to cut you with his swords, because you rose up against the unjust feudal system. Or whatever. I just am not feeling those guys.

航.mnemonic: The captain has a problem with his COLON so he navigates the ship wearing nothing but a diaper and a beret. He doesn't have time to change pants every hour in these rough seas.

般.mnemonic: In general, boats are thrown into the harbor, more often than thrown on land.

猛.mnemonic: The fierce cat ate the child on a plate.

猥.mnemonic: The obscene cat ripped off your clothes and left you naked in the middle of the rice field.

獄.mnemonic: The guy trapped between the viciously fighting cat and dog said, "OMG this is hellish!"

狭.mnemonic:
The two lines in the middle of the husband radical? Those are his arms! So we can say,

KYOU (今日) the husband  adopted a hungry stray cat, who is very narrow, He gestures to his wife with his arms, 'It's THISSSS narrow!'

卵.mnemonic: Looks like 2 eggs with black dots for yolks.

範.mnemonic: The standard car of the year 2100 will be made of environmentally friendly bamboo and have a fingerprint sensor so only the registered owner can drive it.

御.mnemonic: It is the honorable, correct thing to GO to the cops and give them your fingerprints. At least that's what they make foreigners do at the airport!

節.mnemonic: Bamboo grows immediately in this season!

厄.mnemonic: The YAK-thief had the misfortune to leave a fingerprint on the cliff. (and was thusly convicted of Grand Theft Precipice and sent upstate for 2-5 years)

仰.mnemonic: The person in the clown posse band was very pompous.

狙.mnemonic: The cat aims at Abe Lincoln's Hat. It is ready to pounce!!!

査.mnemonic: The tree inspects Abe's hat, to see what it SAW on the night of the assassination (the hat was eventually cleared of all wrongdoing)

祖.mnemonic: I do necrophilia with Abe Lincoln because he's my favorite ancestor.

視.mnemonic: There's a necrophiliac and SHE's peering at you, looking from behind the coffin.

社.mnemonic: That company SHALL pollute the earth till it dies and then commit necrophilia on the dead planet, all in the name of corporate greed!!

祉.mnemonic: Yo Mama : SHE is one lazy necrophiliac- the only time she stops corpse-desecrating is to collect a welfare check.

福.mnemonic: The necrophile poured out some wine for his dead homies - it was good luck that their bodies were so well preserved.

副.mnemonic: Sword-fights at the tavern are a side-effect of too much wine.

幅.mnemonic: The dagger is the same width as a wine bottle.

礼.mnemonic: The polite necrophiliac kept his lovers on meat-hooks, so RAY wouldn't step on them when he came over. Thoughtful!

複.mnemonic: The dorky ducky was wearing very complicated FUKU (服).  All corsets on its wings, all  garters on its webbed feet.

復.mnemonic:
That dork forgot his butt, so I made him go home, return, and get it.

Only a FOOL COUld forget his own butt.

裕.mnemonic: YOU can see duckies because they are abundant in this valley.

俗.mnemonic: The Swamp Thing is an uncouth person, always dripping slime on your moms.

容.mnemonic: With a blingy crown, even Swamp Thing has the appearance of high class.

溶.mnemonic: When that plastic melts it takes the appearance of a liquid.

算.mnemonic: Use a bamboo ruler and your eyes to calculate how far it is from here to hell.

弁.mnemonic: BENNY Hill did a skit once, where moocows speak only the dialect of hell. All pitch-shifted!!

械.mnemonic: I admonish you to always cut down trees with a contraption - don't use your teeth, dummy!

翌.mnemonic: Will the following birds please stand up so we can hook your feathers into this YOKE? (we're working on a sky-chariot here, you understand)

展.mnemonic:
There's TEN exhibits this weekend, but I'm going to the one with the corpse that was kicked to death in the nuts by the hellbunny. 
It has gotten nothing but rave reviews.

惜.mnemonic: Long ago, I lost my heart in a tragic affair. I came so close to getting the SEXY woman of my dreams, which makes it all the more regrettable.

黄.mnemonic: Hellbunnies have the freedom to hop about on yellow legs.

普.mnemonic: In an eclipse, it is normal for planets to line up in front of the sun.

供.mnemonic: A follower is a person who is with  you  all day (KYOU).

洪.mnemonic: Water goes with a flood. It is common sense!! You don't have a flood of Bailey's!! (although, what if?!?)

巷.mnemonic: ..I'm on Tha $treetz with myself - nobody's got your back on tha $treetz.

爆.mnemonic: An explosion is a rampage of fire!!

舗.mnemonic: Ride your unicycle to the stable store, to pick up a stable . How you're going to carry a stable  home on a unicycle, I have no idea.  This is Japanese class, not Super-Arbitrary-Demigod-Questing 101.

講.mnemonic: Nancy Reagan said a lecture on the subject of drug frenzy: "Just say no."

購.mnemonic:
Yo Mama subscribes to her drug frenzy by paying me money every month. 
That's why this website is still free.

悟.mnemonic:
Her heart Got Out of her mouth five times, that's when she knew she was enlightened. 
Because not everyone can do that!

衛.mnemonic: I have to go and defend the orgy from The AYliens?? I dunno. . .

料.mnemonic: Get the ingredients and the rice from the spice rack. This is gonna be some nut-busting risotto here, I tell you that right now.

科.mnemonic: Thanks to science, we now have a CAR that runs on wheat and spices!

史.mnemonic: With her mouth, SHE tells the history of skipping - from the stumbling of drunken cavemen, to the modern ballet.

地.mnemonic: Dangerous scorpions are on the earth in that area.

憎.mnemonic: The more I detest (insert name of personal enemy), the more my heartbeat gains speed.

層.mnemonic: When ice cube gets started    killing crackers, the pile of corpses gains layers SO fast it is like, damn, he really doesn't like crackers.

呂.mnemonic:
Just a regular washtub like you got in your apartment.

Or, let's say, TWO tubs (the two squares) connected by a short line of plumbing in the middle there.

官.mnemonic: In the federal government, bureaucrats wear the crowns and have the power.

館.mnemonic: All the federal workers eat in the same big hall.

棺.mnemonic: Jello Biafra wants to put the federals in a coffin made from trees.

師.mnemonic: The bureaucrats are the masters of the small city.

労.mnemonic: In Japan you can see strong construction work punks with mohawks.

党.mnemonic: My older brother formed the 'mohican party' , a motley coalition of punks whose slogan was 'Kick The Man with your steel-TOE!'

尚.mnemonic: The more that the Man tries to silence him,  the Mohican punk shouts back with his mouth.  (e.g. 'Fuck you Dad!!!!!!!!!')

賞.mnemonic: SHOW me my prize money! I want prize money all the more!

堂.mnemonic: It takes earth to make a hall out of bricks. . . all the more earth if it's an assembly hall !

繕.mnemonic: It is good to mend frayed cloth with string.

週.mnemonic: Each week the Earth moves around the circumference of the sun!!

豪.mnemonic: Let's GO to my very tall, luxurious home!

橋.mnemonic: A guy with a goatee stood on the wooden bridge, chugging the water running under it.

率.mnemonic: Eazy-E tries to keep a ratio of one beret to ten sparkles. Any more sparkles and it might get TOO FABULOUS.

兆.mnemonic: The sparkles from your human legs are an omen or a sign that you're on fire.

律.mnemonic: Go write a regulation to RE-TOOL the electoral college. God damn that thing is useless.

糖.mnemonic: Sugar makes rice suddenly taste sweet!

逮.mnemonic: The cop is in motion, waving his fork, chasing the perp across the water to arrest her. He'll chase her all the way to THAIland if he has to.

康.mnemonic: If you stab the cave wall with a fork, the most pure healthy water comes out.

棄.mnemonic:
If you can deal with the fact that the brush radical is tilted sideways, then have I got a mnemonic for you!


I killed the cow with a fork, and discarded the decapitated cow-head in a tree. No one will think to look for it there!

群.mnemonic: The sheep and all his buddies are moving in a flock and they all have GUNS .

謙.mnemonic: Modest things you say do double-duty: they make you look humble but they also cause people to respect you more for being so modest.

誕.mnemonic: He said he wants to prolong his birthday so he gets presents forever.

浅.mnemonic: I SEND my shish kebab to the bottom of the shallow water and hope to spear a fish!

懐.mnemonic: My heart aches with nostalgia, for the days when UFOs were made out of cloth.

徳.mnemonic: It is virtuous and good-hearted to give the aliens a TOKE of your J when you go to a UFO.

慮.mnemonic: When you think, give some consideration to the tiger please.

虚.mnemonic: The tiger felt empty so it ate the hedgehog.

膚.mnemonic: Your epidermis is inside the tiger's stomach - because you got ate!

該.mnemonic: That GUY said something rude, which corresponds to him getting a pine cone upside the head.

咳.mnemonic: He's coughing because he's got a pine cone lodged in his mouth. Someone do a Heimlich!

之.mnemonic:
This leg is kneeling. The other leg is straight. That's right: the RUSSIAN DANCE!!! 

WHAT IS THE RUSSIAN DANCE?

THIS IS: 



EVERYBODY RUSSIAN DANCE!!!!!!!!!

旗.mnemonic: If you are leading a charge into battle, you gotta wave your flag in that direction.

期.mnemonic: That month was the period of time when we studied KEYS.

堪.mnemonic: Genghis KHAN can't tolerate the earth because it's too enormous. (he's kind of an agoraphobic)

邪.mnemonic: In that town it is heresy to worship the fang.

既.mnemonic: My good dog has my house-KEY already in his fangs all ready when I get home from work!

雅.mnemonic: I GOT to have a turkey fang - it is the most elegant accessory of high society this season.

概.mnemonic: Most GUYS already understand the general concept of trees. Even though they might not be able to explain photosynthesys in detail.

慨.mnemonic: I deplore that GUY already, with all my heart!!!

純.mnemonic: Using string to try and mend a bent dagger is the epitome of stinginess.

以.mnemonic:
You could think of it as a boot (on the left) kicking a high-heeled SHOE (right) and sending the buckle of the hi-heel flying (top):

thus:

I compared my Dr. Martens to your $2,000 designer heel, and I won.

段.mnemonic:
Glen DANzig throws Foolio down a flight of stairs for making fun of Danzig's new-age synthesizer band,Black 
  Aria .

興.mnemonic:
Let's call that weird thing on the right side BIZARRO Foolio, because it's the same as regular Foolio but a mirror image.

Thus, we can say:



I'm interested in Foolio, but at the same time interested in BIZARRO Foolio.

娯.mnemonic: Women listen to the Wu for entertainment.

孤.mnemonic: The isolated child sat in the corner eating watermelon.

融.mnemonic: Fun fact: If YOU fuse Hitler and an insect, you wind up with a small animal.  Probably a capybara, they always look like they're up to something.

互.mnemonic: Two number 5s 五 , giving each other a reciprocal 69er!
